 PREV CLASS   NEXT CLASS FRAMES    NO FRAMES    
SUMMARY: 
java.lang.Object
  com.compendium.core.db.DBViewNode

public class DBViewNode
extends java.lang.Object

The DBViewNode class serves as the interface layer between the NodePosition objects and the ViewNode table in the database.

Author:
Rema and Sajid / Michelle Bachler

Field Summary
static java.lang.String DELETE_NODE_QUERY
          SQL statement to mark ViewNode records for deletion with the given NodeID.
static java.lang.String DELETE_VIEW_QUERY
          SQL statement to mark ViewNode records for deletion with the given ViewID.
static java.lang.String DELETE_VIEWNODE_QUERY
          SQL statement to mark ViewNode record for deletion with the given ViewID and NodeID.
static java.lang.String GET_ACTIVEVIEWS_QUERY
          SQL statement to return the ViewIDs for the given NodeID, if active.
static java.lang.String GET_ACTIVEVIEWSCOUNT_QUERY
          SQL statement to return a count of the ViewIDs for the given NodeID, if active.
static java.lang.String GET_ANYVIEWNODE_QUERY
          SQL statement to return the ViewNode records with the given ViewID and NodeID, whatever the Status.
static java.lang.String GET_DELETEDVIEW_QUERY
          SQL statement to return the ViewNode records with the given ViewID marked for deletion.
static java.lang.String GET_DELETEDVIEWS_QUERY
          SQL statement to return the ViewIDs for the given NodeID, if the ViewNode is marked for deletion, but the Node is still active.

insert

public static NodePosition insert(DBConnection dbcon,
                                  View view,
                                  NodeSummary node,
                                  int x,
                                  int y,
                                  java.util.Date creation,
                                  java.util.Date modification,
                                  java.lang.String userID)
                           throws java.sql.SQLException
Inserts a new viewnode record in the database and returns a NodePosition object representing this record.

Parameters:
DBConnection - dbcon com.compendium.core.db.management.DBConnection, the DBConnection object to access the database with.
view - com.compendium.core.datamodel.View, the view to insert the node into.
node - com.compendium.core.datamodel.NodeSummary, the node to insert into the view.
x, - the x position of the node in the view.
y, - the y position of the node in the view.
creation, - the creation date for this nodeview record.
modification, - the last modified date for this viewnode record.
Returns:
NodePosition object.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

insert

public static
Inserts a new viewnode record in the database and returns a NodePosition object representing this record.





Parameters:
DBConnection - dbcon com.compendium.core.db.management.DBConnection, the DBConnection object to access the database with.
view - the view to insert the node into.
node - the node to insert into the view.
x - the x position of the node in the view.
y - the y position of the node in the view.
creation - the creation date for this nodeview record.
modification - the last modified date for this viewnode record.
sUserID - the current user.
bShowTags - true if this node has the tags indicator draw.
bShowText - true if this node has the text indicator drawn
bShowTrans - true if this node has the transclusion indicator drawn
bShowWeight - true if this node has the weight indicator displayed
bSmallIcon - true if this node is using a small icon
bHideIcons - true if this node is not displaying its icon
nWrapWidth - the node label wrap width used for this node in this view.
nFontSize - the font size used for this node in this view
sFontFace - the font face used for this node in this view
nFontStyle - the font style used for this node in this view
nForeground - the foreground color used for this node in this view
nBackground - the background color used for this node in this view.

Returns:
NodePosition object.

Throws:

java.sql.SQLException

updateFormatting


public static boolean updateFormatting(DBConnection dbcon,
                                       java.lang.String sViewID,
                                       java.lang.String sNodeID,
                                       java.util.Date modification,
                                       boolean bShowTags,
                                       boolean bShowText,
                                       boolean bShowTrans,
                                       boolean bShowWeight,
                                       boolean bSmallIcon,
                                       boolean bHideIcon,
                                       int nWrapWidth,
                                       int nFontSize,
                                       java.lang.String sFontFace,
                                       int nFontStyle,
                                       int nForeground,
                                       int nBackground,
                                       java.lang.String sUserID)
                                throws java.sql.SQLException




Update the formatting for the given node in the given view.





Parameters:
DBConnection - dbcon com.compendium.core.db.management.DBConnection, the DBConnection object to access the database with.
sViewID - the node id of the view the node to update is in.
sNodeID - the id of the node to update the formatting for
modification - the last modified date for this viewnode record.
bShowTags - true if this node has the tags indicator draw.
bShowText - true if this node has the text indicator drawn
bShowTrans - true if this node has the transclusion indicator drawn
bShowWeight - true if this node has the weight indicator displayed
bSmallIcon - true if this node is using a small icon
bHideIcons - true if this node is not displaying its icon
nWrapWidth - the node label wrap width used for this node in this view.
nFontSize - the font size used for this node in this view
sFontFace - the font face used for this node in this view
nFontStyle - the font style used for this node in this view
nForeground - the foreground color used for this node in this view
nBackground - the background color used for this node in this view.
sUserID - the id of the current user.

Returns:
boolean, true if it was successful, else false.

Throws:

java.sql.SQLException

getViewNodes


public static java.util.Vector getViewNodes(DBConnection dbcon,
                                            java.lang.String sViewID)
                                     throws java.sql.SQLException




Returns the array of Node data for the given view id.





Parameters:
DBConnection - dbcon com.compendium.core.db.management.DBConnection, the DBConnection object to access the database with.
sViewID, - the id of the view to return node data for.

Returns:
Vector, of Vector. Each inner Vector conatins:
  
  • NodeID - String
        
  • ViewID - String
        
  • xPos - Integer
        
  • yPos - Integer
  
  • CreationDate - Double (milliseconds)
        
  • ModificationDate - Double (milliseconds)
        
  • Status - Integer

    Throws:

    java.sql.SQLException
    • 

    

    

    


    
getViews
    

    public static java.util.Enumeration getViews(DBConnection dbcon,
                                             java.lang.String sNodeID,
                                             java.lang.String userID)
                                      throws java.sql.SQLException
    

    

    Returns the array of View objects for the given node references, if the record Status is active.

    

    

    Parameters:
    DBConnection - dbcon com.compendium.core.db.management.DBConnection, the DBConnection object to access the database with.
    sNodeID, - the id of the node to return Views for.

    Returns:
    Enumeration, a list of View objects the node is in.

    Throws:

    java.sql.SQLException

    Returns the count Views this node is still active in.

    

    

    

    


    
getActiveViews
    

    public static java.util.Enumeration getActiveViews(DBConnection dbcon,
                                                   java.lang.String sNodeID,
                                                   java.lang.String userID)
                                            throws java.sql.SQLException
    

    

    Returns the array of View objects for the given node references, if the record Status is active.

    

    

    Parameters:
    DBConnection - dbcon com.compendium.core.db.management.DBConnection, the DBConnection object to access the database with.
    sNodeID, - the id of the node to return Views for.

    Returns:
    Enumeration, a list of View objects objects for the given Node id.

    Throws:

    java.sql.SQLException

bIsViewDirty
    

    public static java.lang.Boolean bIsViewDirty(DBConnection dbcon,
                                             java.lang.String sViewID,
                                             java.lang.String sUserName,
                                             java.util.Date dLastViewModDate)
                                      throws java.sql.SQLException
    

    

    Returns TRUE if the given view has been modified since it was last loaded.

    

    

    Parameters:
    DBConnection - dbcon com.compendium.core.db.management.DBConnection, the DBConnection object to access the database with.
    sViewID, - the id of the View to check.
    sUserName - the current users's name
    dLastViewModDate - - date od last modification by another user that we're aware of

    Returns:
    Boolean, TRUE if the view is 'dirty'.

    Throws:

    java.sql.SQLException

                                    throws java.sql.SQLException

    Parameters:

    sViewID, - the view id of the View to check.

    Returns:

                                 throws java.sql.SQLException

    Returns:

    java.sql.SQLException
